Information.Name: bar
Information.Containers: htmlcontainer, dialog, container, tablecell, form, password, dialog_2, vdomclass

Language.Sentence: The Bar type produces an object displayed as a bar with specified color. It is usually used in the function of a colored base for other objects.
Order of rendering the object on the page. By default the value of hierarchy is 0, that means, that the object will be rendered in the order it is written in the XML-file of the VDOM application.

Position in visual hierarchy of objects. If you have several objects in one container situated on each other, the z-index indicates the order of their displaying. The larger z-index is, the upper the object lies.
Spacing from the top edge of the parent object to the current object in pixels.
Spacing from the left edge of the parent object to the current object in pixels.
Width of the object in pixels.
Height of the object in pixels.
Color of the object or object's text. It represents an HTML color code (for example, #FFFFFF - white, #FF0000 - red).
The name of the CSS class.
Incorrect value, must be positive integer from 0 to 99.
Incorrect value, must be either 0 or 1
Incorrect value, must be positive integer from 0 to 9999.
Incorrect value, must be positive integer from 0 to 9999.
Incorrect value, must be positive integer from 0 to 9999.
Incorrect value, must be positive integer from 0 to 999999.
Incorrect value, must be positive integer from 0 to 999999.
Incorrect value, must be six hexadecimal digits
Set new color of the object
Change the cursor type when it points at the object
Move the object to a new position
Change position in visual hierarchy of objects
Resize the object width and height
Start changing the width of the object
Start changing the size of the object
Start changing the height of the object
Fade effect, time is indicated in milliseconds
Hiérarchie de l'objet, ordre de chargement de l'objet par rapport aux autres
Niveau de superposition de l'objet par rapport aux autres
Distance depuis le bord haut de l'objet parent en pixels
Distance depuis le bord gauche de l'objet parent en pixels
Valeur Incorrecte, doit être de six chiffres hexadécimaux
Change position in visual hierarchy of objects
Start changing width of the object
Start changing size of the object
Start changing height of the object

Расстояние от левой границы родительского контейнера до объекта в пикселях
Неправильное значение, должно быть указано целое положительное число
Неправильное значение, должен быть указан 0 или 1

Type.SourceCode:
import sys class VDOM_bar(VDOM_object): def render(self, contents=""): display = u"display:none;" if self.visible == "0" else u"" style_zindex = u"z-index:%s;" % self.zindex if int(self.zindex) <> 0 else u"" # 123 classname = u'class="%s"' % self.classname if self.classname else u"" style = (u"""{display} {zind} position: {pos}; top: {top}px; left: {left}px;""" u"""width: {width}px; height: {height}px; background: #{color}""")\ .format( display = display, zind = style_zindex, pos = self.position, top = self.top, left = self.left, width = self.width, height = self.height, color = self.color) id = u"o_" + (self.id).replace('-', '_') if VDOM_CONFIG_1["DEBUG"] == "1": debug_info = u"objtype='bar' objname='%s' ver='%s'" % (self.name, self.type.version) else: debug_info = u"" result = u"""
{contents}
""".format( debug_info = debug_info, id = id, style = style, classname = classname, contents = contents ) return VDOM_object.render(self, contents=result) def wysiwyg(self, contents=""): result = \ u""" {contents} """.format( id = self.id, vis = self.visible, zind = self.zindex, hierarchy = self.hierarchy, order = self.order, top = self.top, left = self.left, width = self.width, height = self.height, color = self.color, contents = contents, name = self.name) return VDOM_object.wysiwyg(self, contents=result)
